main event: A single unidentified flying object was observed over Colorado Springs, Colorado on January 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a large sheet of plywood with a dome, about three times the size of a house.
The object had three lights - two red and one orange - that were blinking.
The object hovered overhead for a few minutes before moving south behind a house and out of sight.
The sighting lasted for a total of three minutes.
The report includes information from a paperboy and telephone area government official, who were considered reliable witnesses.
sighted object: a large, plywood-like object with a dome and blinking lights
witnesses: civilian witnesses, including a paperboy and telephone area government official
